channel.title: Good stable RSC Server?
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to find a long standing server, I just recently returned to the game and I used to play RSCE when it first came out but it's pretty much safe to say that server is if on its way , if not already dead.
So that brings the question, is there any servers out there currently that are good to play on? I was looking at the MoparScape Classic but it's not released yet right?
All suggestions are greatly appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Good stable RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

If you’re using the 2005 RSCDaemon punBB source, chances are you’re not going to know how to secure your Windows Server 2003. Chances are also you probably won’t realize that no where on the 2005 punBB forum source is there CSRF protection for any form, which securing the server from the ground up won’t do anything for as it’s a client related attack. It takes dedication on both ends, though I’m not really sure what original content could really be added that will add some drive to play RSC. It seems the nit picky bugs that hinder from the original experience are what sets most servers back, in my experience with them anyway. Capturing what RSC was originally is overlooked nowadays.

Read full topic

item.title: Good stable RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

sw0o0sh:

It will be your biggest worry if you’re using a 2005 punBB source in this community of blackhat assholes

No more so than an exploitable/vulnerable OS or software/hardware that can’t withstand an attack really.

MoparRSC is just another one of those attempts, it’s basically just RSCA’s released source code… Anyone could take the project and host it but no one does because it’s just not viable.

Read full topic

item.title: Good stable RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:8, topic:423461”][quote author=sw0o0sh link=topic=526100.msg3831783#msg3831783 date=1322625393]
It will be here when it’s here. Other than that all I see is the same half-assed attempts that have been coming and going for the past 4 years. IE, inject ridden/csrf-able punbb source. It’d be nice to see a real creative attempt, and not just dream about it like I do most nights.
[/quote]
The website should be the least of your worries…[/quote]

It will be your biggest worry if you’re using a 2005 punBB source in this community of blackhat assholes

Read full topic
